definition: to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking

sentences.english: Last night, I dream, you dreamed of a long run, how to catch up with recovery.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚做梦，梦到你跑的好远，怎么追也追不上。

sentences.english: The brain rests, then it becomes active, then dreaming occurs.
sentences.chinese: 大脑休息，然后它变得活跃，然后做梦发生。

sentences.english: This is what psychologists dream about at night.
sentences.chinese: 心理学家做梦也会梦到这些。

sentences.english: She never dreamed the house would be so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她做梦也没想到这栋房子会这么漂亮。

sentences.english: Venkat can keep dreaming on Telangana.
sentences.chinese: 引导可以继续做梦吧在建邦。

sentences.english: I never dreamt that I would spend my old age in such comfort and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我做梦也没想到我能过这样舒适幸福的晚年。

sentences.english: Bree: But people in comas dream, don't they?
sentences.chinese: 但人们会在昏睡中做梦，对吗？

sentences.english: Well, not during those times, perhaps, when I'm dreaming while I'm asleep.
sentences.chinese: 也许当中不包括，我在做梦的时候。

sentences.english: Recent research shows / indicates that daydreaming is part of daily life .
sentences.chinese: 最近的研究成果表明，白日做梦是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: People never want to do one thing.
sentences.chinese: 想像一个你自己做梦也不敢想的目标。

sentences.english: "Your future depends on your dreams . " So go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 你的未来取决于你的梦，快去睡觉做梦吧。

sentences.english: i never dream to meet you here.
sentences.chinese: 我做梦也想不到会在这儿碰见你。

sentences.english: as you suggested by people don’t actually see in their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所提的，实际上人们做梦时看不见东西。

sentences.english: When Yin and Yang are unbalanced, dreams come into being.
sentences.chinese: 当阴阳失衡时，便会做梦。

sentences.english: We sleep peacefully, dream sweetly and speak freely.
sentences.chinese: 我们安详地睡觉，甜甜地做梦，自由地谈话。

sentences.english: If you are snoring, then you cannot be dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 如果你正在打呼噜，那么你就没在做梦。

definition: to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking
talking in one's sleep/words spoken during sleep/fig. speech bearing no relation to reality/delusions
to sleepwalk/to journey in a dream
to rouse/to be woken by sth/to wake with a start/to sleep lightly
